name: Cave RPG
description:
HOW MUCH OF A HERO CAN YOU BECOME?  As measured by a convenient heroness statistic.

(You start at minus 1.)

Synopsis

You're a computer-game-addicted softy with no life, but a nice partner!  Well, your partner wants you to make something of your life.  To prove your worth, you decide to go on an adventure to get the Infinity Stone.

This is a short text adventure (about 20 mins to play through) where there is a map to help you and some small monster pictures to make it more exciting.   Hopefully it's a little fun.

There will be danger.  There will be put-downs.  There may be animal cruelty and temptation - but those are your choices to make...

How to play

1) Choose quick start (a name and partner are chosen for you) or customise (where you choose your name and partner's details.)

2) Walk around by pressing the compass direction at the bottom of the screen.

3) Find items and fight monsters.  The items will help you complete the game.  You can see what you've got in your inventory which is at the bottom of the screen.

COMMENTS - Please post any problems or bugs you notice.

Version 6.1 (14th June 2018)

- Main hall 3 now shows map for main hall 3 and not main hall 2

- The text inputs at the beginning are checked.  If the inputs are invalid, the questions are repeated.

- Some small errors in the text on the final victory screen were fixed.
